<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Echoing Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=6121) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 157 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Wellspring Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=104) (Level 18), [Time Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=191) (Level 20)

</column>

---

You time the components of your spell with exacting precision, setting up a resonance that duplicates the spell's effects. If your next action is to [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734) of 4th rank or lower that has no duration, the spell's energy reverberates and echoes. You can Cast the Spell a second time before the end of your next turn without expending a spell slot.
name: Echoing Spell
